pr_title: Inline CLI option names and defaults

timeline.message:
Inline CLI option names and defaults.
* Fixes intermittently failing unit test because some default values were mutable lists that were being modified
* Easier to read
* Tests are now separated from the production code so they can effectively test the default values and option names rather than automatically expecting whatever the production code does.
Must use a mutable list as the default because PicoCLI mutates it.

timeline.bodyText: I thought it was kind of a nice feature to not have to track down these strings when we change a CLI option name
timeline.author: mbaxter

replies.bodyText: Yeah it does have some advantages, but changing CLI option names should be very rare and very deliberate as it breaks backwards compatibility for users.
replies.author: ajsutton
